output.sentences: My friends and i decided to have a barbecue last week.
Joey, Susan, Kyle and Becky all came.
Becky had to bring her younger sister, she is a little different.
Towards the end, some of use were getting tired.
But not Susan, she was enjoying her night while roasting marshmallows over the fire.
